author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: Build-A-Bear Power Rangers In-Store Event (March 24th-26th)
text:
Have a Power Rangers fan? To celebrate the premiere of the new Power Rangers movie releasing tomorrow, March 24th, Build-A-Bear Workshop will be allowing guests to create their own Power Rangers Ranger Bear from March 24th through March 26th and to participate in Power Rangers in-store activities!
Guest will receive a FREE Mighty Morphin Power Rangers paper mask with an in-store purchase of a Power Rangers Pink Ranger Bear, a Power Rangers Red Ranger Bear, or a Power Rangers costume .

Additionally, Power Rangers costumes will be available for just $10 each (regularly $16) with the purchase of any Make-Your-Own furry friend, valid in Build-A-Bear Workshop stores only.
And through April 16th, you can snag a $10 Gift Card for only $5 with a purchase of $25 or more – available in-stores or online . Keep in mind that your gift card will be valid on a future purchase. You can even send the $10 e-gift card to yourself or someone else and receive it when your order ships!
If you’re wanting to shop online now, you can score $16 off any purchase of $50 or more with promo code SWEET at checkout, valid through March 27th only. Keep in mind that shipping is free with a $40 purchase OR if you have a ShopRunner account, you can score free 2-day shipping with a $25 order.

Even better, if you’re a Costco member, first consider heading on over to your local Costco (in-store or online ) where you can snag 4 $25 Build-A-Bear Gift Cards for only $79.99! If purchasing online , your eTickets should be delivered within the hour to the email address you entered at checkout.
